title: Support Main looking for ADC Silver-Gold
body:
Previously a Gold ADC main, now playing support and looking for ADC

Add me in game Dstyler

replies.body: Hi there! I'm an Unranked Xayah main, trying to find someone to learn the game with. I'm happy to go into ranked, but I feel I've got a lot to learn. If you're willing to put up with a bit of a noob, feel free to accept my friend request.
